titleStmt.title: An elegie, and epitaph for Mistris Abigail Sherard, daughter to the Right Honourable Philip Baron of Lentrimm written by one who honoured her noble family and person.
An elegie, and epitaph for Mistris Abigail Sherard, daughter to the Right Honourable Philip Baron of Lentrimm written by one who honoured her noble family and person.

notesStmt.note: Verse in two columns, the first column being the elegy ("Tis ten dayes since she dy'd, and though I slept,"); the second being 'Her Epitaph.'

Annotations on Thomason copy: [first column, line 37, word 5 ] 'which' has been crossed out and replaced with "what"; [second column, line 13, word 2] 'unto' has been crossed out; [second column, line 14, word 2] 'pain' has been crossed out and replaced with "[illegible]"; [second column, line 24, word 1] 'With' has been crossed out and replaced with "what"; "[Long illegible passage in verse]".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
